This game has a big drawback, it is too addictive! It takes up all my free time. Of course, the game has real drawbacks, such as dishonest players, too low a chance of dropping good items from cases. But I believe the developers will fix it. I will not spend less than 10 hours a week in this game. And someday I will collect a beautiful inventory.
